title: North Texas Shooting, Kim K's Next, Trump Attorney, Sister O'dell and more.
itunes:title: North Texas Shooting, Kim K's Next, Trump Attorney, Sister O'dell and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Are we there yet?  The CLO dealt with liposuction and a separated player with three on the side.  Who's next for Kim K because people are placing bets?  Trump got a billion dollar attorney!  Sister O'dell stops by to address a pastor's "Movado" watch and more.  Junior's Sports Report covered the shooting of a former North Texas running back Mike Hickmon.  Is Prince Harry's underwear worth $1 million or nah?  Visit steveharveyfm.com and get your chance at free money.  Naked jump roping and pickle juice was in today's round of Would You Rather.  Today in Closing Remarks, we wrap up with Steve answering the toughest questions in rapid fire!  DAMN!!!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
